title: Waited a week, no ticket response? Normal?
body: Hi, it's been about a week since I've submitted a ticket, and despite multiple interactions with the support twitter page, including giving them my ticket ID, still nothing. Is this normal? My issue is preventing me from playing so I haven't been able to play for almost a week.

replies.body:
This is definitely not normal, however, we've had a lot of tickets submitted recently, therefore, response times are a bit longer than normal. Sit tight and we'll have a specialist get back to you as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
